text: The Norilsk oil spill was an industrial disaster near Norilsk in Russia. It began on 29 May 2020, when a fuel storage tank at Norilsk-Taimyr Energy's Thermal Power Plant No. 3 failed. It flooded local rivers with of diesel oil. Russian President Vladimir Putin called it a state of emergency in early June. ==References== Category:2020 disasters Category:2020 in Russia Category:Disasters in Europe Category:May 2020 events
title: Norilsk oil spill
